title: Air France Flight 447
summary: Air France Flight 447 (AF447 or AFR447[lower-alpha 1]) was a scheduled international passenger flight from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, to Paris, France.  On 1 June 2009, the Airbus A330 serving the flight stalled and the crew failed to recover, eventually crashing into the Atlantic Ocean at 02:14 UTC, killing all 228 passengers and crew.
